column1: Smoque BBQ////We got the baby back ribs
column3: and pulled pork platters with all the sides they offer. Our favs were the brisket and pulled pork. The baby back looked dry but actually weren't. However
column4: none of us were a fan of the dry rub marinade (that's a personal preference b/c my mom's ribs are 100000x better than anyone else's
